attributes.action: Allow ALL British Citizens living in Europe the right to vote in a PEOPLE’S VOTE
attributes.additional_details:
No Deal &/or Financial Services not included in negotiations means end of March’19 100’s & 1000’s pensioners living on mainland Europe LOSE ACCESS to PENSIONS [UK Government Technical Notice 23.08.18] and their Healthcare [Connexionfrance.com August’18]
Pensioners will return to UK to survive; this overloads all aspects of the NHS, the Benefit systems, Housing Market & Schools/Work Places when working families follow. UK infrastructure collapses, that’s not what the Referendum was about, was it?
attributes.background: A small group of UK Citizens living in Europe were denied THEIR RIGHT TO VOTE in the Referendum! If there’s to be a People’s Vote LET THEM be included in Electoral Register amendments, for the same reason as the House of Lords & People of Gibraltar, as the result affect EVERY aspect of their lives
